Name: Italian Milk Punch
Instructions: Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: The distinctive flavour of moscato grappa shines through in this milky drink, with amaretto adding rich almond notes and Galliano a touch of peppermint and aniseed.
History: A riff on the classic Milk Punch created in 2011 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Italian Milk Punch contains 255 calories
